description: These golden and crunchy potato and cauliflower bites are an ideal after-school snack for the kids. Try this easy recipe today.
keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Potato,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Healthier Cauliflower Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g washed red potatoes, peeled, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Cook cauliflower and potato in a large saucepan of boiling water for 15 minutes or until soft when pierced with a knife. Drain. Set aside to cool completely.

Place bread in a food processor and process for 10 seconds or until fine crumbs form. Add cauliflower and potato mixture, egg, cheddar and chives, reserving 1 tbs. Process for 20 seconds or until mixture is smooth and combined.
Spoon 1 tbs mixture, at a time, onto trays. Spray with oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Serve with yoghurt topped with reserved chives.
